FuncDef: This command creates the message of the day displayed after a successful console login. Only one message can be configured.

ParaDef.Info: When the message of the day is present as a text file, provide both url-prefix and the source-url of the file containing the message of the day. The URL prefix can be local or remote.
Specifies the text of the message of the day. The motd-text-string must be enclosed in double quotes. Multiple text strings are not appended to one another.
